def calculate_max_hotness_bonds(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, men_hotness, women_hotness) = case
        men_hotness.sort()
        women_hotness.sort()
        hotness_bond_sum = sum((men_hotness[i] / women_hotness[i] for i in range(N)))
        results.append(hotness_bond_sum)
    return results

def calculate_max_hotness_bonds(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, men_hotness, women_hotness) = case
        men_hotness.sort()
        women_hotness.sort()
        hotness_bond_sum = sum((men_hotness[i] ** women_hotness[i] for i in range(N)))
        results.append(hotness_bond_sum)
    return results
